name: klaus
text: And it really does spell egg sandwhich. Right around this time Mr. Onstad, you were on a comedy roll.

name: 2kings
text: or he was hungry when he wrote this

name: jdhenry105
text: Given the Bacon Blogs, I rate you as "yes"

name: tellumo
text: A comment left by tellumo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, alphagator, Ariamaki, _cheesekayke, nutmeg, empy)

name: ph3r
text: The best part is that Ray is missing the D, which also occurs here .

name: delzhand
text: Man, that ain't proper notation for anything .

name: zem
text:
I don't get is the delta -> ch or the (n) -> nd

(little help)

name: snatch22
text: My thoughts exactly.  I thought delta->ch might be that delta=change, i.e. ch, but that's a stretch.  But, man, I just love Ray's attitude in this strip.

name: tim_simmons
text: is it a capital letter?

name: pogo
text: What you call "delta" is also the letter pronounced "dee" in the Greek alphabet.

name: geysershitdick
text: I think you're right about the delta standing for "change". As far as the d goes, if you would recall this strip , Ray doesn't know how to spell "sandwich".

name: firesign
text: Awesome catch, but it looks like your container of urls and your container of quotation marks weren't quite sealed all the when you tossed them next to each other in your pantry. Or wherever you keep them.

name: firesign
text: ...and there is nothing more embarrasing than a major typo when you are in the middle of joking about someone else's minor typo. I have defeated myself. goddammit.

name: kirshark
text: I thought the d came in as derivative of w sub i, explaining the cursive-y w sub i.

name: closefriend
text: I'd never have gotten my math degree if I hadn't seen this strip. The "Make Shit Up" approach to proving can go a long way.

name: stuart
text: This exact concept was in The Long, Dark Teatime of the Soul.

name: tatterdemalion
text:
I have always found the title of that book interesting for it's lack of commas. It's almost as if Mister Adams couldn't make up his mind about the inclusion of an Oxford comma and was finally just like "Fine, fine! NO commas! At all!"

...just sayin'.

name: stuart
text: Titles don't comma

name: gormster
text:
I always felt kind of weird that all those incredible characters in the Woodshead amounted to nothing more than a series of examples of what was wrong with the Woodshead.

Also: god damn I want to write a screenplay adaptation of that book, but every time I try - about five times, now - it gets to the point where either it's not funny or makes no sense at all.

name: flurfy
text: I love egg sandwiches.

name: clever-nickname
text:
I hate to join the horde of everyone else doing this, but this was my first achewood, ever.

And an excellent one at that.

name: pogo
text: This was NOT my first Ache.

name: dartigen
text:
This was also not my first Achewood, but it was the one where I finally got off my ass and made an Assbar account.
(I wanted to see what asherdan was always talking about that was annoying people so much.)

name: cellopants
text:
That's...that's actually the same reason I made my account.
Is that bad?

name: postblank
text: Not ten minutes into an X-Files, nor thirty minutes into an X-files, but twenty minutes.  That is the time of maximum confusion.

name: hyetal
text:
And you all knew that exact feeling when you read that line. And that is why Onstad is awesome; I've never read dialogue that seemed to actual ; anything else, in comparison, sounds like a textbook.

(Just as an aside, Firefox claims "dialogue" is spelled wrong. Did I miss a memo?)

name: rowboat
text: Maybe it prefers "dialog." I don't, but it may.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Tuesday Blogs

Teodor: Beer Class Fin / Letter to Cook's Illustrated

Teodor's bruschetta technique is also handy for getting olive oil onto eggplant slices which you intend to grill.

name: direhaggis
text:
e(g^2):%u03A3b-1(n)wi%u0394

(Damn you, BBCode)

name: direhaggis
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: charchar
text: How did you do that? Was it black magic or just force of will? Teach me .

name: alzuna
text: Select it, it is an image .

name: atticusonline
text: ohhhhhhhhhhh shiiiiiiiiiiiit

name: adonkon
text: Beef's handwriting here looks very similar to Ultra Peanut's.

name: lolsworth
text: God, fuck mathematics.

name: miku224
text: Sorry, man, I gotta represent and find this comment lame.

name: lolsworth
text: Screw you, mathematics! FUCK you!

name: elsewhere
text: You mean Fuck... Algebra! ?

name: cellopants
text: ...he says, as the comment maintains its 0 Chubbies/ 0 Lames status.
